code: import{basePath,apiVersion}from"./config";export function getMenuApi(){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/get-menus");return fetch(url).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result;}).catch(function(err){return err.message;});}export function updateMenuApi(token,menuId,data){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/update-menu/").concat(menuId);var params={method:"PUT",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:token},body:JSON.stringify(data)};return fetch(url,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result.message;}).catch(function(err){return err.message;});}export function activateMenuApi(token,menuId,status){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/activate-menu/").concat(menuId);var params={method:'PUT',headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:token},body:JSON.stringify({active:status})};return fetch(url,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result.message;}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});}export function addMenuApi(token,menu){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/add-menu");var params={method:'POST',headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:token},body:JSON.stringify(menu)};return fetch(url,params).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(result){return result.message;}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});}export function deleteMenuApi(token,idMenu){var url="".concat(basePath,"/").concat(apiVersion,"/delete-menu/").concat(idMenu);var params={method:'DELETE',headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:token}};return fetch(url,params).then(function(reponse){return reponse.json();}).then(function(result){return result.message;}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});}
